name: Arcade Blox
description:
Should work on windows!

Beta 2.1 is out!

-No more clipping out of the world

-Better textures "I hope"

-Unity's particles

-Slightly less slippery. (First lvl only)

-Help menu!

Lets hope...

Whoops forgot to update the zip. Sorry lads

If ya can please donate. Because even 1 dollar is a nice cup of coffee!

But the game will stay free until its in a more Playable Form.
